items.title: Login Page Implementation
items.description: Develop a login page allowing users to authenticate using their registered credentials.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter username/email and password
System validates credentials against stored user data
Successful login redirects user to the dashboard
Invalid credentials display an error message without revealing sensitive information
non_functional: Page loads within 2 seconds on standard broadband
Supports latest two versions of major browsers

notes: Assumed standard username/password authentication; no mention of multi-factor authentication or social login.
